original_text:
For God has no need to consider a man further,
    that he should go before God in judgment.
korean_text: 하나님은 사람을 심판하시기에 오래 생각하실 것이 없으시니

sentences.original_text: For God has no need to consider a man further
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 사람을 더 살피실 필요가 없으니

sentences.original_text: that he should go before God in judgment.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 하나님 앞에서 심판을 받아야 함을
